2546 /**
2547  * @param single_nodeindex Single node index (Input)
2548  * @param component_index Shanchen component index (Input)
2549  * @param n_a Pointer to local node residing in array a(Input)
2550 */
2551 __device__ __inline__ float calc_massmode(LB_nodes_gpu n_a, int single_nodeindex, int component_index){
2552 
2553  /** mass mode */
2554  float mode;
2555  mode = n_a.vd[( 0 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex]
2556  + n_a.vd[( 1 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] + n_a.vd[( 2 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex]
2557  + n_a.vd[( 3 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] + n_a.vd[( 4 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex]
2558  + n_a.vd[( 5 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] + n_a.vd[( 6 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex]
2559  + n_a.vd[( 7 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] + n_a.vd[( 8 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex]
2560  + n_a.vd[( 9 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] + n_a.vd[(10 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex]
2561  + n_a.vd[(11 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] + n_a.vd[(12 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex]
2562  + n_a.vd[(13 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] + n_a.vd[(14 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex]
2563  + n_a.vd[(15 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] + n_a.vd[(16 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex]
2564  + n_a.vd[(17 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] + n_a.vd[(18 + component_index*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex];
2565 
2566  mode += para.rho[component_index]*para.agrid*para.agrid*para.agrid;
2567 
2568  return mode;
2569 }
2570 
2571 __device__ __inline__ void calc_shanchen_contribution(LB_nodes_gpu n_a,int component_index, int x, int y, int z, float *p){
2572 
2573  float tmp_p[3]={0.0f,0.0f,0.0f};
2574  float pseudo;
2575  int index;
2576 
2577  index = (x+1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*y + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*z;
2578  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2579  tmp_p[0]+=pseudo/18.0f;
2580 
2581  index = (para.dim_x+x-1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*y + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*z;
2582  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2583  tmp_p[0]-=pseudo/18.0f;
2584 
2585  index = x + para.dim_x*((y+1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*z;
2586  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2587  tmp_p[1]+=pseudo/18.0f;
2588 
2589  index = x + para.dim_x*((para.dim_y+y-1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*z;
2590  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2591  tmp_p[1]-=pseudo/18.0f;
2592 
2593  index = x + para.dim_x*y + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((z+1)%para.dim_z);
2594  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2595  tmp_p[2]+=pseudo/18.0f;
2596 
2597  index = x + para.dim_x*y + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((para.dim_z+z-1)%para.dim_z);
2598  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2599  tmp_p[2]-=pseudo/18.0f;
2600 
2601  index = (x+1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*((y+1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*z;
2602  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2603  tmp_p[0]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2604  tmp_p[1]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2605 
2606  index = (para.dim_x+x-1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*((para.dim_y+y-1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*z;
2607  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2608  tmp_p[0]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2609  tmp_p[1]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2610 
2611  index = (x+1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*((para.dim_y+y-1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*z;
2612  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2613  tmp_p[0]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2614  tmp_p[1]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2615 
2616  index = (para.dim_x+x-1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*((y+1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*z;
2617  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2618  tmp_p[0]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2619  tmp_p[1]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2620 
2621  index = (x+1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*y + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((z+1)%para.dim_z);
2622  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2623  tmp_p[0]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2624  tmp_p[2]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2625 
2626  index = (para.dim_x+x-1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*y + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((para.dim_z+z-1)%para.dim_z);
2627  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2628  tmp_p[0]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2629  tmp_p[2]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2630 
2631  index = (x+1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*y + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((para.dim_z+z-1)%para.dim_z);
2632  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2633  tmp_p[0]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2634  tmp_p[2]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2635 
2636  index = (para.dim_x+x-1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*y + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((z+1)%para.dim_z);
2637  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2638  tmp_p[0]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2639  tmp_p[2]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2640 
2641  index = x + para.dim_x*((y+1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((z+1)%para.dim_z);
2642  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2643  tmp_p[1]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2644  tmp_p[2]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2645 
2646  index = x + para.dim_x*((para.dim_y+y-1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((para.dim_z+z-1)%para.dim_z);
2647  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2648  tmp_p[1]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2649  tmp_p[2]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2650 
2651  index = x + para.dim_x*((y+1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((para.dim_z+z-1)%para.dim_z);
2652  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2653  tmp_p[1]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2654  tmp_p[2]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2655 
2656  index = x + para.dim_x*((para.dim_y+y-1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((z+1)%para.dim_z);
2657  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,component_index);
2658  tmp_p[1]-=pseudo/36.0f;
2659  tmp_p[2]+=pseudo/36.0f;
2660 
2661  p[0]=tmp_p[0];
2662  p[1]=tmp_p[1];
2663  p[2]=tmp_p[2];
2664 }
2665 
2666 /** function to calc shanchen forces
2667  * @param n_a Pointer to local node residing in array a(Input)
2668  * @param node_f Pointer to local node force (Input)
2669 */
2670 __global__ void lb_shanchen_GPU(LB_nodes_gpu n_a,LB_node_force_gpu node_f){
2671 #ifndef D3Q19
2672 #error Lattices other than D3Q19 not supported
2673 #endif
2674 #if ( LB_COMPONENTS == 1 )
2675  #warning shanchen forces not implemented
2676 #else
2677 
2678  unsigned int index = blockIdx.y * gridDim.x * blockDim.x + blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
2679  unsigned int xyz[3];
2680  float pseudo;
2681 
2682  if(index<para.number_of_nodes)
2683  if( n_a.boundary[index] == 0 )
2684  {
2685 
2686  /* ShanChen forces are not reset at the end of the integration cycle,
2687  in order to compute properly the hydrodynamic fields, so we have
2688  to reset them here. For the standard LB this is not needed */
2689  reset_LB_forces(index, node_f) ;
2690  /*Let's first identify the neighboring nodes */
2691  index_to_xyz(index, xyz);
2692  int x = xyz[0];
2693  int y = xyz[1];
2694  int z = xyz[2];
2695 
2696  #pragma unroll
2697  for(int ii=0;ii<LB_COMPONENTS;ii++)
2698  {
2699  float p[3]={0.0f,0.0f,0.0f};
2700  pseudo = calc_massmode(n_a,index,ii);
2701 
2702  #pragma unroll
2703  for(int jj=0;jj<LB_COMPONENTS;jj++)
2704  {
2705  float tmpp[3]={0.0f,0.0f,0.0f};
2706  calc_shanchen_contribution(n_a, jj, x,y,z, tmpp);
2707 
2708  // FIXME coupling HAS to be rescaled with agrid....
2709  p[0] += - para.coupling[(LB_COMPONENTS)*ii+jj] * pseudo * tmpp[0];
2710  p[1] += - para.coupling[(LB_COMPONENTS)*ii+jj] * pseudo * tmpp[1];
2711  p[2] += - para.coupling[(LB_COMPONENTS)*ii+jj] * pseudo * tmpp[2];
2712  }
2713 
2714  node_f.force[(0+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index]+=p[0];
2715  node_f.force[(1+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index]+=p[1];
2716  node_f.force[(2+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index]+=p[2];
2717 /* copy to be used when resetting forces */
2718  node_f.scforce[(0+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index]=p[0];
2719  node_f.scforce[(1+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index]=p[1];
2720  node_f.scforce[(2+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index]=p[2];
2721  }
2722  }
2723 #endif
2724  return;
2725 }
2726 
2727 #endif //SHANCHEN
2728 
2729 /** kernel to set the local density
2730  *
2731  * @param n_a the current nodes array (double buffering!)
2732  * @param single_nodeindex the node to set the velocity for
2733  * @param rho the density to set
2734  * @param d_v Pointer to the local modes
2735 */
2736 __global__ void set_rho(LB_nodes_gpu n_a, LB_rho_v_gpu *d_v, int single_nodeindex,float *rho) {
2737 
2738  unsigned int index = blockIdx.y * gridDim.x * blockDim.x + blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
2739  /*Note: this sets the velocities to zero */
2740  if(index == 0)
2741  {
2742  float local_rho;
2743 
2744  #pragma unroll
2745  for(int ii=0;ii<LB_COMPONENTS;++ii)
2746  {
2747  /** default values for fields in lattice units */
2748  local_rho = (rho[ii]-para.rho[ii])*para.agrid*para.agrid*para.agrid;
2749  d_v[single_nodeindex].rho[ii]=rho[ii];
2750 
2751  n_a.vd[(0 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/ 3.0f * local_rho ;
2752  n_a.vd[(1 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/18.0f * local_rho ;
2753  n_a.vd[(2 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/18.0f * local_rho ;
2754  n_a.vd[(3 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/18.0f * local_rho ;
2755  n_a.vd[(4 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/18.0f * local_rho ;
2756  n_a.vd[(5 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/18.0f * local_rho ;
2757  n_a.vd[(6 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/18.0f * local_rho ;
2758  n_a.vd[(7 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2759  n_a.vd[(8 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2760  n_a.vd[(9 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2761  n_a.vd[(10 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2762  n_a.vd[(11 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2763  n_a.vd[(12 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2764  n_a.vd[(13 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2765  n_a.vd[(14 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2766  n_a.vd[(15 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2767  n_a.vd[(16 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2768  n_a.vd[(17 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2769  n_a.vd[(18 + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + single_nodeindex] = 1.0f/36.0f * local_rho ;
2770  }
2771  }
2772 }

2781 __global__ void init_boundaries(int *boundary_node_list, int *boundary_index_list, int number_of_boundnodes, LB_nodes_gpu n_a, LB_nodes_gpu n_b){

2793  * @param n_a Pointer to local node residing in array a (Input)
2794  * @param n_b Pointer to local node residing in array b (Input)
2795 */
2796 __global__ void reset_boundaries(LB_nodes_gpu n_a, LB_nodes_gpu n_b){
2797 
2798  size_t index = blockIdx.y * gridDim.x * blockDim.x + blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
2799 
2800  if(index<para.number_of_nodes)
2801  n_a.boundary[index] = n_b.boundary[index] = 0;
2802 }
2803 
2804 /** integrationstep of the lb-fluid-solver
2805  * @param n_a Pointer to local node residing in array a (Input)
2806  * @param n_b Pointer to local node residing in array b (Input)
2807  * @param *d_v Pointer to local device values (Input)
2808  * @param node_f Pointer to local node force (Input)
2809  * @param ek_parameters_gpu Pointer to the parameters for the electrokinetics (Input)
2810 */
2811 
2812 
2813 __global__ void integrate(LB_nodes_gpu n_a, LB_nodes_gpu n_b, LB_rho_v_gpu *d_v, LB_node_force_gpu node_f, EK_parameters* ek_parameters_gpu) {
2814  /**every node is connected to a thread via the index*/
2815  unsigned int index = blockIdx.y * gridDim.x * blockDim.x + blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
2816  /**the 19 moments (modes) are only temporary register values */
2817  float mode[19*LB_COMPONENTS];
2818  LB_randomnr_gpu rng;
2819 
2820  if( index < para.number_of_nodes )
2821  {
2822  /** storing the seed into a register value*/
2823  rng.seed = n_a.seed[index];
2824  /**calc_m_from_n*/
2825  calc_m_from_n(n_a, index, mode);
2826  /**lb_relax_modes*/
2827  relax_modes(mode, index, node_f,d_v);
2828  /**lb_thermalize_modes */
2829  if (para.fluct)
2830  {
2831  thermalize_modes(mode, index, &rng);
2832  }
2833 #if defined(EXTERNAL_FORCES) || defined (SHANCHEN)
2834  /**if external force is used apply node force */
2835  apply_forces(index, mode, node_f,d_v);
2836 #else
2837  /**if particles are used apply node forces*/
2838  if (para.number_of_particles) apply_forces(index, mode, node_f,d_v);
2839 #endif
2840  /**lb_calc_n_from_modes_push*/
2841  normalize_modes(mode);
2842  /**calc of velocity densities and streaming with pbc*/
2843  calc_n_from_modes_push(n_b, mode, index);
2844  /** rewriting the seed back to the global memory*/
2845  n_b.seed[index] = rng.seed;
2846  }
2847 }
2848 
2849 /** part interaction kernel
2850  * @param n_a Pointer to local node residing in array a (Input)
2851  * @param *particle_data Pointer to the particle position and velocity (Input)
2852  * @param *particle_force Pointer to the particle force (Input)
2853  * @param *part Pointer to the rn array of the particles (Input)
2854  * @param node_f Pointer to local node force (Input)
2855  * @param *fluid_composition Pointer to the local fluid composition for the Shanchen
2856  * @param *d_v Pointer to local device values
2857 */
2858 __global__ void calc_fluid_particle_ia(LB_nodes_gpu n_a, CUDA_particle_data *particle_data, float *particle_force, CUDA_fluid_composition * fluid_composition, LB_node_force_gpu node_f, CUDA_particle_seed *part, LB_rho_v_gpu *d_v){
2859 
2860  unsigned int part_index = blockIdx.y * gridDim.x * blockDim.x + blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
2861  unsigned int node_index[8];
2862  float delta[8];
2863  float delta_j[3*LB_COMPONENTS];
2864  float partgrad1[8*LB_COMPONENTS];
2865  float partgrad2[8*LB_COMPONENTS];
2866  float partgrad3[8*LB_COMPONENTS];
2867  LB_randomnr_gpu rng_part;
2868  if(part_index<para.number_of_particles)
2869  {
2870 #if defined(IMMERSED_BOUNDARY) || defined(VIRTUAL_SITES_COM)
2871  if ( !particle_data[part_index].isVirtual )
2872 #endif
2873  {
2874  rng_part.seed = part[part_index].seed;
2875 
2876  /**force acting on the particle. delta_j will be used later to compute the force that acts back onto the fluid. */
2877  calc_viscous_force(n_a, delta, partgrad1, partgrad2, partgrad3, particle_data, particle_force, fluid_composition,part_index, &rng_part, delta_j, node_index, d_v, 0);
2878  calc_node_force(delta, delta_j, partgrad1, partgrad2, partgrad3, node_index, node_f);
2879 
2880 #ifdef ENGINE
2881  if ( particle_data[part_index].swim.swimming ) {
2882  calc_viscous_force(n_a, delta, partgrad1, partgrad2, partgrad3, particle_data, particle_force, fluid_composition,part_index, &rng_part, delta_j, node_index, d_v, 1);
2883  calc_node_force(delta, delta_j, partgrad1, partgrad2, partgrad3, node_index, node_f);
2884  }
2885 #endif
2886 
2887  /**force which acts back to the fluid node */
2888  part[part_index].seed = rng_part.seed;
2889  }
2890  }
2891 }
2892 
2893 /** part interaction kernel
2894  * @param n_a Pointer to local node residing in array a (Input)
2895  * @param *particle_data Pointer to the particle position and velocity (Input)
2896  * @param *particle_force Pointer to the particle force (Input)
2897  * @param *part Pointer to the rn array of the particles (Input)
2898  * @param node_f Pointer to local node force (Input)
2899  * @param *d_v Pointer to local device values
2900 */
2901 __global__ void calc_fluid_particle_ia_three_point_couple(LB_nodes_gpu n_a, CUDA_particle_data *particle_data, float *particle_force, LB_node_force_gpu node_f, CUDA_particle_seed *part, LB_rho_v_gpu *d_v){
2902 
2903  unsigned int part_index = blockIdx.y * gridDim.x * blockDim.x + blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
2904  unsigned int node_index[27];
2905  float delta[27];
2906  float delta_j[3*LB_COMPONENTS];
2907  LB_randomnr_gpu rng_part;
2908  if(part_index<para.number_of_particles){
2909 
2910  rng_part.seed = part[part_index].seed;
2911  /**force acting on the particle. delta_j will be used later to compute the force that acts back onto the fluid. */
2912  calc_viscous_force_three_point_couple(n_a, delta, particle_data, particle_force, part_index, &rng_part, delta_j, node_index,d_v,0);
2913  calc_node_force_three_point_couple(delta, delta_j, node_index, node_f);
2914 
2915 #ifdef ENGINE
2916  if ( particle_data[part_index].swim.swimming ) {
2917  calc_viscous_force_three_point_couple(n_a, delta, particle_data, particle_force, part_index, &rng_part, delta_j, node_index,d_v,1);
2918  calc_node_force_three_point_couple(delta, delta_j, node_index, node_f);
2919  }
2920 #endif
2921 
2922  /**force which acts back to the fluid node */
2923  part[part_index].seed = rng_part.seed;
2924  }
2925 }

2930  * @param n_a Pointer to local node residing in array a (Input)

2942 #ifdef SHANCHEN
2943 __global__ void lb_shanchen_set_boundaries(LB_nodes_gpu n_curr){
2944 /* This implements neutral boundary conditions for the shanchen fluid (i.e., 90 deg contact angle) */
2945 
2946  unsigned int index = blockIdx.y * gridDim.x * blockDim.x + blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
2947  unsigned int xyz[3];
2948  if(index<para.number_of_nodes){
2949  if(n_curr.boundary[index] != 0 ) {
2950  index_to_xyz(index, xyz);
2951  unsigned int x = xyz[0];
2952  unsigned int y = xyz[1];
2953  unsigned int z = xyz[2];
2954  unsigned int to_index_x,to_index_y,to_index_z,to_index;
2955  int c[3],count=0;
2956 
2957  for(int ii=0;ii<LB_COMPONENTS;ii++)
2958  for(int comp=0;comp<19;comp++)
2959  n_curr.vd[(comp + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + index] = 0.0 ;
2960  for(c[0]=-1;c[0]<=1;c[0]++){
2961  for(c[1]=-1;c[1]<=1;c[1]++){
2962  for(c[2]=-1;c[2]<=1;c[2]++){
2963  to_index_x = (x+c[0]+para.dim_x)%para.dim_x;
2964  to_index_y = (y+c[1]+para.dim_y)%para.dim_y;
2965  to_index_z = (z+c[2]+para.dim_z)%para.dim_z;
2966  to_index = to_index_x + para.dim_x*to_index_y + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*to_index_z;
2967  if(n_curr.boundary[to_index] == 0 ) {
2968  for(int ii=0;ii<LB_COMPONENTS;ii++){
2969  for(int comp=0;comp<19;comp++){ /* We copy all velocities: at the end we will need
2970  only the density mode, but this introduces no overhead anyway */
2971  n_curr.vd[(comp + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + index] +=
2972  n_curr.vd[(comp + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + to_index] ;
2973  count++;
2974  }
2975  }
2976  }
2977  }
2978  }
2979  }
2980  if(count>0)
2981  for(int ii=0;ii<LB_COMPONENTS;ii++)
2982  for(int comp=0;comp<19;comp++)
2983  n_curr.vd[(comp + ii*LBQ ) * para.number_of_nodes + index] /= count ;
2984  }
2985  }
2986 }
2987 #endif /* SHANCHEN */

3043 __global__ void momentum(LB_nodes_gpu n_a, LB_rho_v_gpu * d_v, LB_node_force_gpu node_f, float *sum) {
3044 
3045  unsigned int index = blockIdx.y * gridDim.x * blockDim.x + blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
3046 
3047  if(index<para.number_of_nodes)
3048  {
3049  float j[3]={0.0f,0.0f,0.0f};
3050  float mode[4];
3051 
3052  for(int ii=0 ; ii < LB_COMPONENTS ; ii++ )
3053  {
3054  calc_mode(mode, n_a, index,ii);
3055 
3056  j[0] += mode[1]+node_f.force[(0+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index];
3057  j[1] += mode[2]+node_f.force[(1+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index];
3058  j[2] += mode[3]+node_f.force[(2+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index];
3059  }
3060 
3061 #ifdef LB_BOUNDARIES_GPU
3062  if(n_a.boundary[index])
3063  j[0]=j[1]=j[2]=0.0f;
3064 #endif
3065 
3066  atomicadd(&(sum[0]), j[0]);
3067  atomicadd(&(sum[1]), j[1]);
3068  atomicadd(&(sum[2]), j[2]);
3069  }
3070 }
3071 __global__ void remove_momentum(LB_nodes_gpu n_a, LB_rho_v_gpu * d_v, LB_node_force_gpu node_f, float *sum) {
3072 
3073  unsigned int index = blockIdx.y * gridDim.x * blockDim.x + blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
3074  if(index<para.number_of_nodes){
3075  for(int ii=0 ; ii < LB_COMPONENTS ; ii++ ) {
3076  node_f.force[(0+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index]-=sum[0]/para.number_of_nodes;
3077  node_f.force[(1+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index]-=sum[1]/para.number_of_nodes;
3078  node_f.force[(2+ii*3)*para.number_of_nodes + index]-=sum[2]/para.number_of_nodes;
3079  }
3080  }
3081 }

3328 /**setup and call particle kernel from the host

3330 void lb_calc_particle_lattice_ia_gpu(){

3340 
3341  if ( lbpar_gpu.lb_couple_switch & LB_COUPLE_TWO_POINT )
3342  {
3343  KERNELCALL( calc_fluid_particle_ia, dim_grid_particles, threads_per_block_particles,
3344  ( *current_nodes, gpu_get_particle_pointer(),
3345  gpu_get_particle_force_pointer(), gpu_get_fluid_composition_pointer(),
3346  node_f, gpu_get_particle_seed_pointer(), device_rho_v )
3347  );
3348  }
3349  else { /** only other option is the three point coupling scheme */
3350 #ifdef SHANCHEN
3351 #if __CUDA_ARCH__ >= 200
3352  fprintf (stderr, "The three point particle coupling is not currently compatible with the Shan-Chen implementation of the LB\n");
3353  errexit();
3354 #endif
3355 #endif
3356  KERNELCALL( calc_fluid_particle_ia_three_point_couple, dim_grid_particles, threads_per_block_particles,
3357  ( *current_nodes, gpu_get_particle_pointer(),
3358  gpu_get_particle_force_pointer(), node_f,
3359  gpu_get_particle_seed_pointer(), device_rho_v )
3360  );
3361  }
3362  }
3363 }

3495 /** setup and call kernel to calculate the temperature of the hole fluid
3496  * @param host_temp value of the temperatur calcutated on the GPU
3497 */
3498 void lb_calc_fluid_temperature_GPU(double* host_temp){
3499 
3500  int host_number_of_non_boundary_nodes = 0;
3501  int *device_number_of_non_boundary_nodes;
3502  cuda_safe_mem(cudaMalloc((void**)&device_number_of_non_boundary_nodes, sizeof(int)));
3503  cuda_safe_mem(cudaMemcpy(device_number_of_non_boundary_nodes, &host_number_of_non_boundary_nodes, sizeof(int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice));
3504 
3505  float host_jsquared = 0.0f;
3506  float* device_jsquared;
3507  cuda_safe_mem(cudaMalloc((void**)&device_jsquared, sizeof(float)));
3508  cuda_safe_mem(cudaMemcpy(device_jsquared, &host_jsquared, sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice));

3511  int threads_per_block = 64;
3512  int blocks_per_grid_y = 4;
3513  int blocks_per_grid_x = (lbpar_gpu.number_of_nodes + threads_per_block * blocks_per_grid_y - 1) /(threads_per_block * blocks_per_grid_y);
3514  dim3 dim_grid = make_uint3(blocks_per_grid_x, blocks_per_grid_y, 1);

3649 /**integration kernel for the lb gpu fluid update called from host */
3650 void lb_integrate_GPU() {
3651 
3652  /** values for the kernel call */
3653  int threads_per_block = 64;
3654  int blocks_per_grid_y = 4;
3655  int blocks_per_grid_x = (lbpar_gpu.number_of_nodes + threads_per_block * blocks_per_grid_y - 1) /(threads_per_block * blocks_per_grid_y);
3656  dim3 dim_grid = make_uint3(blocks_per_grid_x, blocks_per_grid_y, 1);
3657 
3658 #ifdef LB_BOUNDARIES_GPU
3659  if (n_lb_boundaries > 0)
3660  {
3661  cuda_safe_mem(cudaMemset( lb_boundary_force, 0, 3*n_lb_boundaries*sizeof(float)));
3662  }
3663 #endif
3664 
3665  /**call of fluid step*/
3666  /* NOTE: if pi is needed at every integration step, one should call an extended version
3667  of the integrate kernel, or pass also device_rho_v_pi and make sure that either
3668  it or device_rho_v are NULL depending on extended_values_flag */
3669  if (intflag == 1)
3670  {
3671  KERNELCALL(integrate, dim_grid, threads_per_block, (nodes_a, nodes_b, device_rho_v, node_f, lb_ek_parameters_gpu));
3672  current_nodes = &nodes_b;
3673  intflag = 0;
3674  }
3675  else
3676  {
3677  KERNELCALL(integrate, dim_grid, threads_per_block, (nodes_b, nodes_a, device_rho_v, node_f, lb_ek_parameters_gpu));
3678  current_nodes = &nodes_a;
3679  intflag = 1;
3680  }
3681 
3682 #ifdef LB_BOUNDARIES_GPU
3683  if (n_lb_boundaries > 0)
3684  {
3685  KERNELCALL(apply_boundaries, dim_grid, threads_per_block, (*current_nodes, lb_boundary_velocity, lb_boundary_force));
3686  }
3687 #endif
3688 }

3690 void lb_gpu_get_boundary_forces(double* forces) {
3691 #ifdef LB_BOUNDARIES_GPU
3692  float* temp = (float*) malloc(3*n_lb_boundaries*sizeof(float));
3693  cuda_safe_mem(cudaMemcpy(temp, lb_boundary_force, 3*n_lb_boundaries*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost));
3694 
3695  for (int i =0; i<3*n_lb_boundaries; i++)
3696  {
3697  forces[i]=(double)temp[i];
3698  }
3699  free(temp);
3700 #endif
3701 }
3702 
3703 __device__ void get_interpolated_velocity(LB_nodes_gpu n_a, float* r, float* u, LB_node_force_gpu node_f, int asdf) {
3704 
3705  /** see ahlrichs + duenweg page 8227 equ (10) and (11) */
3706  float temp_delta[6];
3707  float delta[8];
3708  int my_left[3];
3709  int node_index[8];
3710  float mode[4];
3711  u[0]=u[1]=u[2]=0;
3712  #pragma unroll
3713  for(int i=0; i<3; ++i){
3714  float scaledpos = r[i]/para.agrid - 0.5f;
3715  my_left[i] = (int)(floorf(scaledpos));
3716  temp_delta[3+i] = scaledpos - my_left[i];
3717  temp_delta[i] = 1.f - temp_delta[3+i];
3718  }
3719 
3720  delta[0] = temp_delta[0] * temp_delta[1] * temp_delta[2];
3721  delta[1] = temp_delta[3] * temp_delta[1] * temp_delta[2];
3722  delta[2] = temp_delta[0] * temp_delta[4] * temp_delta[2];
3723  delta[3] = temp_delta[3] * temp_delta[4] * temp_delta[2];
3724  delta[4] = temp_delta[0] * temp_delta[1] * temp_delta[5];
3725  delta[5] = temp_delta[3] * temp_delta[1] * temp_delta[5];
3726  delta[6] = temp_delta[0] * temp_delta[4] * temp_delta[5];
3727  delta[7] = temp_delta[3] * temp_delta[4] * temp_delta[5];
3728 
3729  // modulo for negative numbers is strange at best, shift to make sure we are positive
3730  int x = my_left[0] + para.dim_x;
3731  int y = my_left[1] + para.dim_y;
3732  int z = my_left[2] + para.dim_z;
3733 
3734  node_index[0] = x%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*(y%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*(z%para.dim_z);
3735  node_index[1] = (x+1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*(y%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*(z%para.dim_z);
3736  node_index[2] = x%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*((y+1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*(z%para.dim_z);
3737  node_index[3] = (x+1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*((y+1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*(z%para.dim_z);
3738  node_index[4] = x%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*(y%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((z+1)%para.dim_z);
3739  node_index[5] = (x+1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*(y%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((z+1)%para.dim_z);
3740  node_index[6] = x%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*((y+1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((z+1)%para.dim_z);
3741  node_index[7] = (x+1)%para.dim_x + para.dim_x*((y+1)%para.dim_y) + para.dim_x*para.dim_y*((z+1)%para.dim_z);
3742 
3743  for(int i=0; i<8; ++i)
3744  {
3745  float totmass=0.0f;
3746 
3747  if(n_a.boundary[node_index[i]])
3748  continue;
3749 
3750 
3751  calc_m_from_n(n_a,node_index[i],mode);
3752 
3753  #pragma unroll
3754  for(int ii=0;ii<LB_COMPONENTS;ii++)
3755  {
3756  totmass+=mode[0]+para.rho[ii]*para.agrid*para.agrid*para.agrid;
3757  }
3758 
3759 #ifndef SHANCHEN
3760  u[0] += (mode[1]/totmass)*delta[i];
3761  u[1] += (mode[2]/totmass)*delta[i];
3762  u[2] += (mode[3]/totmass)*delta[i];
3763 #else //SHANCHEN
3764 // u[0] += d_v[node_index[i]].v[0]/8.0f;
3765 // u[1] += d_v[node_index[i]].v[1]/8.0f;
3766 // u[2] += d_v[node_index[i]].v[2]/8.0f;
3767 #warning "lb_radial_velocity_profile does not work with SHANCHEN yet/"
3768  u[0] = 0;
3769  u[1] = 0;
3770  u[2] = 0;
3771 #endif
3772 
3773 // mode[1]+=0.5f*node_f.force[0*para.number_of_nodes + node_index[i]];
3774 // mode[2]+=0.5f*node_f.force[1*para.number_of_nodes + node_index[i]];
3775 // mode[3]+=0.5f*node_f.force[2*para.number_of_nodes + node_index[i]];
3776 //
3777  }
3778 
3779  #pragma unroll
3780  for(int i=0; i<3; ++i){
3781  u[i]*=para.agrid/para.tau;
3782  }
3783 }
3784 __global__ void fill_lb_radial_velocity_profile(LB_nodes_gpu n_a, radial_profile_data* pdata, float* data, LB_node_force_gpu node_f){
3785 
3786  unsigned int rbin=threadIdx.x;
3787  unsigned int phibin=blockIdx.x;
3788  unsigned int zbin=blockIdx.y;
3789 
3790  float roffset=pdata->minr;
3791  float r_incr=(pdata->maxr-pdata->minr)/(pdata->rbins-1);
3792 
3793  float r = roffset + rbin*r_incr;
3794 
3795  unsigned int maxj;
3796  float phioffset, phi_incr;
3797  if ( pdata->phibins == 1 ) {
3798  maxj = (int)floorf( 2*3.1415f*pdata->maxr/para.agrid ) ;
3799  phioffset=0;
3800  phi_incr=2*3.1415f/maxj;
3801  } else {
3802  maxj = pdata->phibins;
3803  phioffset=pdata->minphi;
3804  phi_incr=(pdata->maxphi-pdata->minphi)/(pdata->phibins);
3805  }
3806  float phi = phioffset + phibin*phi_incr;
3807 
3808  unsigned int maxk;
3809  float zoffset, z_incr;
3810  if ( pdata->zbins == 1 ) {
3811  maxk = (int) para.dim_z;
3812  zoffset=-pdata->center[2];
3813  z_incr=para.agrid;
3814  } else {
3815  maxk = (int) pdata->zbins;
3816  zoffset=pdata->minz;
3817  z_incr=(pdata->maxz-pdata->minz)/(pdata->zbins-1);
3818  }
3819 
3820  float z = zoffset + zbin*z_incr;
3821 
3822  float p[3];
3823  p[0]=r*cos(phi)+pdata->center[0];
3824  p[1]=r*sin(phi)+pdata->center[1];
3825  p[2]=z+pdata->center[2];
3826 
3827  float v[3];
3828  get_interpolated_velocity(n_a, p, v, node_f, 0);
3829  unsigned int linear_index = rbin*maxj*maxk + phibin*maxk + zbin;
3830 
3831  float v_r,v_phi;
3832 
3833  if (r==0) {
3834  v_r=0;
3835  v_phi=0;
3836  } else {
3837  v_r = 1/r*((p[0]-pdata->center[0])*v[0] + (p[1]-pdata->center[1])*v[1]);
3838  v_phi = 1/r/r*((p[0]-pdata->center[0])*v[1]-(p[1]-pdata->center[1])*v[0]);
3839  }
3840  data[3*linear_index+0]=v_r;
3841  data[3*linear_index+1]=v_phi;
3842  data[3*linear_index+2]=v[2];
3843 
3844 }
3845 
3846 
3847 int statistics_observable_lbgpu_radial_velocity_profile(radial_profile_data* pdata, double* A, unsigned int n_A){
3848 
3849  unsigned int maxj, maxk;
3850  float normalization_factor=1;
3851 
3852  if ( pdata->rbins == 1 ) {
3853  return 1;
3854  }
3855 
3856  unsigned int maxi=pdata->rbins;
3857 
3858  if ( pdata->phibins == 1 ) {
3859  maxj = (int)floorf( 2*3.1415f*pdata->maxr/lbpar_gpu.agrid ) ;
3860  normalization_factor/=maxj;
3861  } else {
3862  maxj = pdata->phibins;
3863  }
3864  if ( pdata->zbins == 1 ) {
3865  maxk = (int) lbpar_gpu.dim_z;
3866  normalization_factor/=maxk;
3867  } else {
3868  maxk = pdata->zbins;
3869  }
3870 
3871  for (int i = 0; i<n_A; i++) {
3872  A[i]=0;
3873  }
3874 
3875 
3876  // copy radial profile to device
3877  radial_profile_data* pdata_device;
3878  cuda_safe_mem(cudaMalloc((void**)&pdata_device, sizeof(radial_profile_data)));
3879  cuda_safe_mem(cudaMemcpy(pdata_device, pdata, sizeof(radial_profile_data), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice));
3880 
3881  // allocate data on device
3882  float* data_device;
3883  cuda_safe_mem(cudaMalloc((void**)&data_device, sizeof(float)*3*maxi*maxj*maxk));
3884  // kernellcall
3885  int threads_per_block = maxi;
3886  int blocks_per_grid_x = maxj;
3887  int blocks_per_grid_y = maxk;
3888  dim3 dim_grid = make_uint3(blocks_per_grid_x, blocks_per_grid_y, 1);
3889  KERNELCALL(fill_lb_radial_velocity_profile, dim_grid, threads_per_block, (nodes_a, pdata_device, data_device, node_f ));
3890 
3891  // allocate data on host
3892  float* host_data;
3893  host_data = (float*) malloc(sizeof(float)*3*maxi*maxj*maxk);
3894 
3895  // copy data back
3896  cuda_safe_mem(cudaMemcpy(host_data, data_device, sizeof(float)*3*maxi*maxj*maxk, cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost));
3897 
3898  // average (or store)
3899  unsigned int linear_index;
3900  for (int i =0; i<maxi; i++)
3901  for (int j =0; j<maxj; j++)
3902  for (int k =0; k<maxk; k++) {
3903  linear_index = 0;
3904  if (pdata->rbins > 1)
3905  linear_index += i*pdata->phibins*pdata->zbins;
3906  if (pdata->phibins > 1)
3907  linear_index += j*pdata->zbins;
3908  if (pdata->zbins > 1)
3909  linear_index +=k;
3910  A[3*linear_index+0]+=host_data[3*(i*maxj*maxk + j*maxk + k)+0]*normalization_factor;
3911  A[3*linear_index+1]+=host_data[3*(i*maxj*maxk + j*maxk + k)+1]*normalization_factor;
3912  A[3*linear_index+2]+=host_data[3*(i*maxj*maxk + j*maxk + k)+2]*normalization_factor;
3913  }
3914 
3915  // free device data
3916  cudaFree(pdata_device);
3917  cudaFree(data_device);
3918 
3919  // free host data
3920  free(host_data);
3921 
3922  return 0;
3923 }
3924 
3925 #endif /* LB_GPU */
